en: The cost to society will be substantial, the report says. In 2019 alone, it estimates a $290 billion burden from health care, long-term case and hospice combined. Medicare and Medicaid will cover $195 billion of that, with out-of-pocket costs to caregivers reaching $63 billion.
zul: Izindleko zomphakathi zizoba zinkulu, ngokusho kombiko. Ngonyaka wezi-2019 uwodwa, umthwalo wezindleko zezempilo ulinganiselwa kuzigidigidi ezingama-$290, kuhlanganiswa ukugula kwesikhathi eside kanye ne-hospice.  I-Medicare ne-Medicaid izokhokhela izindleko eziyizigidigidi ezingama-$195 walokho, ngezindleko ezikhokhwa ngqo zabanakekeli ezifinyelela kuzigidigidi ezingama-$63.
mt0: <pad> Ukubiza uhulumeni kuzoba okunengi, le ncwadi ithi. Ngo-2019 kuphela, it iqikelisa ukuthi uhulumeni uzosebenzisa imali engu-290 billion ukunakekela abantu abadala, izinto ezithatha isikhathi eside kanye ne-hospice. I-Medicare ne-Medicaid izohlanganisa i-$195 billion yalokho, kanti izindleko ezingaphuma emkhakheni zalabo abakhathalela abantu abadala zilingana u-$63 billion.</s>

en: "We are excited that this tool has proven useful to guide local restoration efforts such as the Swan Island Oyster Sanctuary restoration project currently underway in North Carolina," Theuerkauf says. "The beauty of this model and approach is that it can be modified for use in a number of different habitat restoration efforts -- such as mangrove restoration in Florida, where the benefits the habitat provides are different from those of oyster reefs, but similarly very valuable."
zul: "Siyakujabulela ukuthi le nsiza ibonakalile ukuthi izosiza ukuhola ukuvuselelwa kwe-Swan Island Oyster Sanctuary kwasendaweni oqhubekayo njengamanje eNorth Carolina," kusho uTheuerkauf.  "Okuhle ngalolu hlelo nendlelakwenza wukuthi ingalungiselelwa ukusetshenziswa ezindaweni zokuhlala ezahlukene zokubuyisa -- njengokubuyiselwa kwezihlahla ze-mangrove eFlorida, lapho izinzuzo ezihlinzekwa yileyo ndawo zehlukile kunalezo zothunge lwembada, kodwa nazo zibaluleke ngokufanayo."
mt0: <pad> "Siyajabula ukuthi leli ferramenta lisetshenziswe ukuqondisa izinhlelo zokubuyisela ezifana ne- Swan Island Oyster Sanctuary eNorth Carolina," kusho uTheuerkauf. "Isimanga sendlela le ukuthi ingashintshwa ukuze isetshenziswe ezinye izinhlelo zokubuyisela izindawo -- njengokubuyiselwa kwe-mangrove eFlorida, lapho izinzuzo ezihlinzeka yindawo zihlukile kunalezo ze-oyster reefs, kodwa ziyabalulekile kakhulu."</s>

en: Rosario, based at Saratoga in New York for the summer, made the right choice to spend the weekend at Del Mar. zul: URosario, oseSaratoga eNew York ngesikhathi sasehlobo, uthathe isinqumo esifanele sokuchitha impelasonto eDel Mar. Uphunyuke ekushiseni okubi okuphoqe ukusulwa kwekhadi langoMgqibelo eSaratoga, futhi unqobile eSan Diego emincintiswaneni emine ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuBanga II $200,000 San Clemente Stakes egibele iMucho Unusual.
mt0: <pad> Rosario, ohlala eSaratoga eNew York phakathi nonyaka, wenza isinqumo esifanele sokuqeda isonto eDel Mar. en: Last week, the South Bend City Councilman Oliver Davis endorsed former Vice President Joe Biden in what several outlets viewed as a rejection of Mayor Pete. NgoLwesihlanu, uDavis utshele i-Politico ukuthi ukujabulele ukubona umuntu omele i-Indiana kuzwelonke, kodwa uBiden ubonakalise ukuba nesipiliyoni esiningi kunalo muntu oneminyaka engama-37.

en: However, the loss of two Labour first minsters - first the sudden death of Donald Dewar and then the resignation of Henry McLeish - followed by the lacklustre and lackadaisical administration of Jack McConnell and the catastrophic organisation of the 2007 elections - opened the door to an SNP minority government by the narrowest of margins.

en: Shellfish collected by children are most easily identified by variety and size, Keegan said. Child foragers tend to be generalists, meaning that they're more likely to collect small shells indiscriminately. This research suggests that small, easy to transport and low-yield mollusks found in high amounts on a site indicate the presence of child foragers, he said.
zul: Ama-shellfish aqoqwa izingane kuvame ukuba lula ukuwahlonza ngokohlobo nobungako, kusho uKeegan. Abadobi abayizingane bavame ukubheka okujwayelekile, okusho ukuthi maningi kakhulu amathuba okuthi baqoqe amagobolondo amancane ngaphandle kokukhetha. Uthe, lolu cwaningo lusho ukuthi izinkovu ezincane, okulula ukuzithutha nezinenzuzo encane ezitholakala ziziningi kakhulu endaweni ziveza ukuthi bekukhona abadobi abayizingane.
mt0: <pad> Izivakashi ezinganeni eziqoqa izinhlanzi zingabonakala kalula ngokuhlukahlukana nobungako, uKegan ukusho. Abaqoqi abancane bathanda ukuqoqa izinhlanzi ezincane, ezilula ukuze zithuthiwe futhi ezingabuyiswanga, okuyinto engaziwa ukuthi ngabe izingane ziyazibutha.</s>

The Leicester coach Kolo Touré will surely also have good counsel to give on that front.
zul: USoyuncu usadinga ukulungiswa kancane, nakanjani. Umdlalo owodwa i-Leicester eyahlulwe kuwo kuleli hlandla lokudlala kube, ngokuqondana, owe-Manchester United, lapho uMarcus Rashford aheha uSoyuncu ukuthi ayekele iphenalthi. Ubufakazi okwamanje busho ukuthi uRodgers no-Evans bazosiza umdlali wasesiswini odlala emuva aphumelele kangcono ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa ubuyena. Umqeqeshi we-Leicester uKolo Touré nakanjani uzoba nezeluleko ezilungile azomnika zona maqondana nalokho.
mt0: <pad> Soyuncu udinga ukuthuthukiswa okuncane, yebo. Ukubonakala kwanjengamanje kubonisa ukuthi Rodgers no-Evans bazosiza umdlali ophakathi ukuba abe ophumelele kakhulu ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa ngumuntu wakhe. Umqeqeshi weLeicester Kolo Toure uzobe enenkosi yokunikeza imiyalelo efanele ephathelene nalokho.</s>

en: The production of sperm -- otherwise known as spermatogenesis -- generates more than 1,000 sperm per second in normal males. This productivity comes, in part, from a special cell type called the spermatogonial stem cell. The staying power of this stem cell has allowed many celebrities, including Robert DeNiro and Pablo Picasso, to father children after the age of 65.
zul: Ukukhiqizwa kwezidoda - okubuye kubizwe ngokuthi i-spermatogenesis - kukhiqiza izidoda ezingaphezu kwe-1,000 ngomzuzu ngamunye emadodeni ngokuvamile. Lokhu kukhiqiza kwenzeka, njengengxenye, kuvela kuhlobo lweseli olukhethekile olubizwa nge-spermatogonial stem cell. Amandla okuhlala ale stem cell avumele ukuthi inqwaba yosaziwayo, okubandakanya uRobert DeNiro noPablo Picasso, babe woyise bezingane beneminyaka engama-65.
mt0: <pad> Ukukhiqizwa kwe-sperm - okubizwa ngokuthi spermatogenesis - kudala ama-sperm angaphezu kwe-1000 ngomzuzu emehlweni abantu abavamile. Leli ukusebenza kahle ivela, ngokuyinhloko, hlobo oluthile lweseli elithi i-spermatogonial stem cell. Imandla ohlala njalo kwaleli seli le-stem cell livumela izinkanyezi eziningi, kuhlanganise uRobert DeNiro noPablo Picasso, ukuba babe nezingane ngemuva kweminyaka engu-65.</s>

en: The hamburger chain's partnership with DoorDash will start Monday in Houston, Texas region in more than 200 restaurants. McDelivery launched in the U.S. in 2017 and globally, it has grown to a $3 billion business for both McDonald's and franchise restaurants, the company said.

en: That 1973 work by Ms. Tharp, whose mix of classical and modern dance has led it to be considered the first crossover ballet, was resurrected for the current generation, who danced it with daring and aplomb, making it a hit all over again.

mt0: <pad> Umsebenzi ka-1973 kaNkk. Tharp, owahlanganisa izinhlobo ezimbili zokudansa eklasikekile neyesimanje, ukwenza kube iballet yokuqala yokuhlangana, wavuswa ngoba abantu abasha, abadansa ngayo ngokuzithoba nangokukhuluma, yenza ukuthi ibe hit futhi.</s>

en: "There will be a jump up in the threshold, which means that people with high drug spending will have to pay more before they can get this extra help," Neuman said.

en: Converting the country to 100 percent clean power? In Vermont alone, which has a goal of achieving 90 percent renewable energy by midcentury, the cost is estimated at $33 billion. Yet the state is seeing job growth in clean energy sectors and expects the transition will spur cost savings for consumers.
zul: Ukushintsha izwe lisebenzise amandla kagesi olungele imvelo ngamaphesenti ayi-100? EVermont iyodwa, enomgomo wokuthola amaphesenti angama-90 kagesi ovuselelwayo maphakathi nekhuluminyaka, izindleko zilinganiselwa kuzigidigidi ezingama-$33. Kepha uhulumeni ubona ukwanda kwemisebenzi emikhakheni kagesi olungele imvelo futhi ulindele ukuthi lolu guquko lulethele amakhasimende ukonga ezindlekweni.
mt0: <pad> Ukuguqula izwe libe amandla angu-100 e-green? In Vermont, eyazini enohlelo lokuthola 90% amandla abuyisekayo ngasekupheleni kwekhulu lama-20 leminyaka, izindleko ezilinganiswe ku $33 billion. Nokho, isimo sibona ukukhula emkhakheni we-energy e-green futhi sithemba ukuthi ukushintshwa kuzodala izindleko zokusabela zabahlali.</s>

en: Today, those using Planck and cosmic background data to obtain a value for the Hubble constant get a figure of 67.4 plus or minus 0.5. By contrast the local approach gives a figure of 73.5 plus or minus 1.4. These values represent the two different values we have for the expansion of the universe. (See "A matter of metrics," below.)
zul: Namuhla, labo abasebenzisa i-Planck kanye nemininingo yomlando womhlaba ukuzothola isilinganiso se-Hubble bathola inani elingu-67.4 plus noma umayinazi 0.5. Okushayisana nendlela esetshenziswa endaweni ekhipha inani elingu-73.5 plus noma umayinazi 1.4. Lezi zilinganiso zimele amanani amabili ahlukene esinawo okwandisa umhlaba wonke jikelele. (Bheka "i-A matter of metrics," ngezansi.)
mt0: <pad> Namuhla, labo abasebenzisa i-Planck futhi idatha yendawo yokukhanya ukuze bafumane inani le-Hubble constant bathola inombolo engu-67.4 plus or minus 0.5. Ngokuqinile, indlela yasendawo iphakanyiswe inombolo engu-73.5 plus or minus 1.4. Lezi zinhlamvu zibonisa izinhlamvu ezimbili ezihlukene ze-expansion of the universe. (Bheka "A matter of metrics," ngezansi.)</s>

en: For a majority of people, music is a part of everyday life, and living without it is impossible. It's a constant companion, one that kids develop a taste for during their formative years and bring with them as an adult. Some merely use it as a distraction, while some love it so much that it influences them as a person. Some even write it for a living.
zul: Ebantwini abaningi, umculo uyingxenye yempilo yansukuzonke, futhi ayikho indlela yokuphila ngaphandle kwawo. Kuhlala kuhamba phambili, uyilokho izingane eziqala ukukuthanda zisezincane futhi ziqhubeke nakho nasebudaleni. Abanye bawusebenzisa njengento yokuphazamisa, kube abanye bawuthanda kangangoba uba nomthelela kubo njengabantu. Abanye baze bawubhale okuba yindlela yabo yokuziphilisa.
mt0: <pad> Kwabaningi, umculo yingxenye yempilo yakho nsuku zonke, futhi ukuphila ngaphandle kwayo akunakwenzeka. Ungumngane oqhubekayo, umuntu izingane zifunda ukuthanda phakathi neminyaka yabo yokuthuthukiswa futhi baphathe kubo njengoba abadala. Abanye basebenzisa ukuba ukuchitha isikhathi, kanti abanye bamthanda kakhulu kangangokuba ubasiza ukuba babe abantu. Abanye ngisho babhala ngayo ukuze baphile.</s>

en: Unlike cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, nifties are cryptographic tokens that represent a unique asset or good on the blockchain, are one of a kind, and are not interchangeable. Blockchains can enable gamers to buy and trade interoperable digital collectibles such as skins, dances, and in-game items, helping further fuel a $50 billion-plus annual market1 for virtual goods.
zul: Hhayi njengama-cryptocurrencies anjenge-bitcoin, ama-nifties angamathokheni anezithombe ezi-cryptographic ezimele impahla ehlukile kwi-blockchain, okungavamile, futhi okungasebenziseki ngokushintshanisa. Ama-blockchain angenza abadlali bathenge futhi bahwebe ngezinto ezisebenza ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali ezoqoqekayo njengama-skin, abadansi, nezinto zemidlalo, okusiza ukuqhubeka nokufaka isamba esingaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingu-$50 ezimakethe maqondana nempahla yezobuchwepheshe ephakathi kumakhompyutha.
mt0: <pad> Unlike cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, nifties are cryptographic tokens that represent a unique asset or good on the blockchain, are one of a kind, and are not interchangeable. Blockchains can enable gamers to buy and trade interoperable digital collectibles such as skins, dances, and in-game items, helping further fuel a $50 billion-plus annual market1 for virtual goods.</s>

en: For one thing, Sondland's testimony explicitly and in detail outlined what he described without reservation as a quid pro quo - one focused on an effort to leverage an official White House meeting to pressure Ukraine to announce new investigations. The claim that "no quid pro quo" ever occurred is the opposite of what Sondland testified. It's just that the quid pro quo that Sondland expressly articulated isn't the one that was the subject of that call.
zul: Ngento eyodwa, ubufakazi bukaSondland ngokusobala buveza imininingwane yalokho okuchazwe ngokusobala ukuthi i-quid pro quo - egxile emizamweni yokusebenzisa umhlangano we-White House osemthethweni ukufakela i-Ukraine ingcindezi yokumemezela ngophenyo olusha. Ukuthi "no quid pro quo" kwake kwenzeka kuphambene nalokho okushiwo uSondland lapho efakaza. Wukuthi nje i-quid pro quo yokuthi uSondland waveza ngokusobala akusikho obekuyisihloko ebesidingidwa kulolo cingo.
mt0: <pad> Kwamunye, uSondland wabe esetshela ngokucacile nangokugcwele lokho abakuchaze ngokuthi i-quid pro quo - eyayigxile ekusetshenzisweni kweWhite House ukucindezela i-Ukraine ukuba ibike izinhlolovo ezintsha. Ukutjho ukuthi "akukho quid pro quo" okwenzekile kuhlukile kulokho uSondland watshela.</s>

en: Neither the United States nor any nation on Earth has sent a manned mission to the moon since NASA's Apollo 17 mission left in late 1972. While the space administration has periodically made plans to return, none have reached the operational phase. A large part of the reason is a lack of money and support.
zul: Akusiyo i-United States noma elinye izwe eMhlabeni elithumele okuqhumayo enyangeni kusukela ngomsebenzi we-Apollo 17 ye-NASA eyamba ngowe-1972. Njengoba abaphethe ezasemkhathini bebenze izinhlelo zezinkathi zokubuyela, akekho oseke wafinyelela esigabeni sokwenza lokho. Ingxenye enkulu yalesi sizathu wukusosha ngemali nokwesekwa.
mt0: <pad> Ngabe u-United States noma izwe elilodwa emhlabeni lithumele isiteshi esikhululiwe eMwezini kusukela u-Apollo 17 we-NASA oshiya ekupheleni kuka-1972? Nakuba i-space administration ithatha izinhlelo zokubuya, ayikho eyafika emaqenjini wokusebenza. Iningi lesizathu ukuthi ayikho eyafinyelela emaqenjini wokusebenza.</s>

en: When I booked a three-day singing retreat at Peter Evans's farmhouse in rural France, I had been apprehensive about displaying my pitiful abilities to some intimidating Oxford choral scholar type. Kodwa esikhundleni salokho ngizithole ngiculela phansi kukhala isigingci sisho iculo ngokugcizelela indlela yokukhuluma yaseLondon kuhambisana namahlaya amabi kakhulu.

en: Anirban Lahiri of India did not have to qualify for his previous two U.S. Opens, and he doesn't want to have to go through it again. Lahiri had no trouble with a 65 at Scioto and a 67 at Brookside, but he could do without the stress. He had never seen either course, opting for what he called "point and shoot."
zul: U-Anirban Lahiri waseNdiya akazange afaneleke ukungena kuma-U.S. Open amabili adlule, futhi akudingeki aphinde adlule kuwo futhi. ULahiri akabanga nenkinga ne-65 at Scioto kanye ne-67 at Brookside, kodwa ubengakwenza ngaphandle kwengcindezi. Ubengakazi azibone zonke izinkundla zokudlala, wakhetha lokhu akubize ngokuthi "point and shoot."
mt0: <pad> Anirban Lahiri wase-India akazange afaneleke ukuba umuntu wokuqala othatha indawo e-US Open, futhi akafuni ukukwenza lokho futhi. Lahiri wathola i-65 e-Scioto ne-67 e-Brookside, kodwa angeke akhathazeke kakhulu. Wayengakaze ubone noma yimuphi umgwaqo, opting for what he called "point and shoot."</s>

en: Meanwhile, the oil market received a more direct boost this week on news that Saudi Arabia slashed shipments to the United States. The US has the most transparent and up-to-date data on the oil market, which include weekly releases on production levels, imports and exports, and inventories. That kind of visibility is not readily available in most places around the world.
zul: Kusenjalo, imakethe kawoyela ithole uxhaso oluqonde ngqo kuleli sonto ngezindaba zokuthi iSaudi Arabia iyeke ukuthumele impahla e-United States. I-US inemininingo esobala kakhulu nebuyekeziwe maqondana nezimakethe zawoyela, okubandakanya ukukhishwa kwamazinga omkhiqizo esonto, okuthengiselwa amanye amazwe nokuthengwa kuvela kwamanye amazwe, kanye nohlu lwempahla. Lolo hlobo lokubonakala alutholakali ngaleso sikhathi ezindaweni eziningi emhlabeni.
mt0: <pad> Ngaphezu kwalokho, imakethe ye-oyili yathola ukuthuthukiswa okuqondile kuleli sonto ngenxa yokuthi i-Saudi Arabia ukunciphise ukuthengiswa kwe-oyili eMelika. I-US inedatha ebonakalayo kakhulu futhi evuselelwe kakhulu yemakethe ye-oyili, kuhlanganise izinsuku ezithile zokukhishwa kwezinga lokukhiqiza, ukuhweba nokuhweba, kanye nezinqolobane. Le hlobo lokubuka imakethe le-oyili ayetholakala kalula ezweni elikhulu lamanye amazwe.</s>

en: The blaze at the ABC daycare in Hermosillo, Sonora state was seen as an avoidable tragedy that happened due to negligence. There were no smoke detectors or fire extinguishers at the facility, and the emergency exit was jammed.

en: "My son was in a camp and returned home with his family," said Fathia Abdullah, 55. "He was arrested with 25 other people by militia after another man was made to confess. The judge said my son must stay in jail for life."

en: Though Washington is largely preoccupied with an impeachment frenzy and the fallout from recent state elections, socialist stalwart Bernie Sanders (I-Vermont) was one of the few 2020 candidates to weigh in on the Iranian move, calling the decision "concerning," but nonetheless arguing for a return to the nuclear deal, known formally as the JCPOA.

mt0: <pad> Ngaphandle kokuthi Washington igcwele ukukhathazeka nge-impeachment frenzy kanye nokubuyekezwa kwamanye amazwe, uBernie Sanders (I-Vermont) ongumuntu wokuqala 2020 ukuba ahlanganyele esinyathelweni sase-Iran, ekhuluma ngokuthi isinqumo "sikhathaza," kodwa futhi efuna ukubuyela emvumelwano wamakhangibavakashi, owaziwa ngokusemthethweni ngokuthi JCPOA.</s>

en: Even in country music: There is a hell of a big stretch going from Hank Williams to Garth Brooks, buddy! That process of change happens in all genres. Rock "n" roll sort of took a beating and is now basically irrelevant, because it got mined to death. But whatever anybody wants to call me is O.K. I've been called worse things than the "Godfather of Punk"!

I-Rock "n" roll ihlulekile futhi manje ayisathandwa kangako, ngoba yaculwa kakhulu. Kodwa noma yini umuntu afuna ukungibiza yona akunandaba, maningi kabi amagama angemnandi esengibizwe ngawo “kuno-Godfather of Punk"!
mt0: <pad> Ngaphandle kwakho: Kukhona uhlobo olukhulu olusuka ku-Hank Williams kuya ku-Garth Brooks, buddy! Le nqubo yokushintsha isebenza kuzo zonke izinhlobo. I-Rock "n" Roll ithatha ukulimala futhi isesimweni esingabalulekanga, ngoba ithole ukulimala okukhulu. Kodwa noma ngubani angibiza ngizizwa kahle. Ngibizelwa izinto ezimbi kunokuba "The Godfather of Punk"!</s>

mt0: <pad> Dean added: "Kuthathe ngaphezu kwekhulu leminyaka ukufunda nokuchazwa kwalesi silwane, kodwa kuyafaneleka ukulinda. Akukhona ukuthi ucwaningo lwethu luveze imininingwane emangalisayo mayelana nokwakheka kwenhloko yalesi silwane, kodwa futhi lezi ziphumela ziyasiza abaphenyi bamandulo ukuba bahlole ubuhlobo bakhe nezinye izilwane ezidla izinhlanzi."</s>

en: Joby Aviation Inc. is targeting the air-taxi market with a plane that would carry four passengers and travel 150 miles. Uber Technologies Inc. plans to start an electric flying-taxi service, with pilot programs in Dallas, Los Angeles and Melbourne as soon as next year. Israel-based Eviation plans test flights next summer of its all-electric Alice, a nine-passenger plane powered by a smaller version of the magniX motor in Harbour's Beaver.
zul: I-Joby Aviation Inc. ihlose ukuba imakethe yezindiza ezingamatekisi ithenge indiza ekwazi ukuthwala abagibeli abane futhi ihambe amamayela angu-150. I-Uber Technologies Inc. ihlela ukuqala izinsiza zamatekisi andizayo ogesi, ngezinhlelo ezise-Dallas, e-Los Angeles nase-Melbourne khona maduze ngonyaka ozayo. I-Eviation ekwa-Israel ihlela ukuhlola izindiza ehlobo elizayo ze-Alice kagesi, indiza ehlalisa abagibeli abayisishiyagalolunye eqhutshwa uhlobo oluncane lwenjini ye-magniX e- Harbour's Beaver.
mt0: <pad> Joby Aviation Inc. ithatha indawo emakethe ye-air-taxi ngebhanoyi elingakwazi ukuthwala abantu abane futhi lihambe amamayela angu-150. Uber Technologies Inc. ihlelelwe ukuqala uhlelo lwe-electric flying-taxi, kanye nezinhlelo zokusebenza ezivivinywa e-Dallas, Los Angeles and Melbourne ngasekuqaleni kwalonyaka.</s>

en: As he spoke, Mr. Hsu was surrounded by old and new works that demonstrate how hard he is to categorize: He's sort of a painter and sort of a sculptor, and he works with photography, too. But his creations aren't really "installations" in the way the term is used these days, either.

en: Yet the picture showed them in what seemed to be a well-equipped design and technology workshop. en: You should get in the habit of interrogating every new app before downloading, regardless of where the company is based. Figure out what permissions it asks for, what it does with your information and ask: Is this sketchy? But don't take it from me, my Wirecutter colleague Thorin Klosowski created some great instructions as part of our Privacy Project guide that might help you practice safe app downloading. Here's a relevant excerpt:
zul: Kumele ujwayele ukucubungula uhlelokusebenza olusha ngalunye ngaphambi kokuba uludawunilode, noma ngabe inkampani ingeyakuphi. Thola izimvume ezifunayo, nekwenzayo ngemininingwane yakho futhi ubuze: Ingabe lokhu akunakho ukungathembeki? Kodwa ungezwa ngami, uzakwethu wase-Wirecutter uThorin Klosowski wenze imiyalelo ephuma phambili njengengxenye yomhlahlandlela wethu woMsebenzi Wemfihlo ongase ukusize ukuba udawunilode uhlelokusebenza ngokuphephile. Nasi isicaphuno esihambisana nakho:
mt0: <pad> Ufanele ube esenzalweni yokubuza yonke i-app entsha ngaphambi kokuyilanda, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi inkampani iphi. Funda izincwadi ezicela izinzuzo, enze kanjani ngedatha yakho futhi uzibuze: Ingabe lokhu kubonakala sengathi kuyathusa? Kodwa ungangithathela mina, umngane wami uThorin Klosowski wenze izimiso ezinhle njengengxenye yethu ye-Privacy Project ezokusiza ukuba ufunde ukulanda i-app ngokuphepha.</s>

en: Now, one thing everybody knows about me is that I cannot fight. If you asked my sister Kay whether I can handle myself in a scrap, she would throw back her head and cackle like a witch. I was hopeless. But every day I'd be rolling around on the ground with Danny Waverly, who hated me for the sole reason that I was black. I was tired of the constant scrapping. I needed to think my way out of this.

en: In the more than 70 self-portraits that make up South African artist and visual activist Muholi's exhibit, "Somnyama Ngonyama, Hail the Dark Lioness," the artist reclaims the images of black and brown people who have historically been exoticized and othered in visual media. Here Muholi, whose pronouns are they/them, tells their own story.

Lapha uMuholi, onezabizwana ezithi ba-/bona, okuyizona ezixoxa indaba yazo.
mt0: <pad> In the more than 70 self-portraits that make up South African artist and visual activist Muholi's exhibit, "Somnyama Ngonyama, Hail the Dark Lioness," the artist reclaims the images of black and brown people who have historically been exoticized and othered in visual media. en: "I do something eccentric that has surprised some unsuspecting passengers ― I put on a sheet mask every few hours! I buy bulk packages of hydrating Asian sheet masks, without fragrance so that they don't irritate my skin or the noses of people around me. They generally contain hyaluronic acid and other gentle moisturizing ingredients ... This keeps my skin feeling well-hydrated and comfortable throughout the flight." ― La Carmina
zul: "Ngenza into engavamile ethuse abagibeli abebengalindele ― Ngifake imaskhi yephepha njalo emuva kwamahora ambalwa! Ngithenga amaphakethe amamaskhi ephepha ase-Asia aqeda ukoma kwesikhumba, angenawo amakha ukuze angasiphazamisi isikhumba sami noma amakhala abantu abasondelene nami. Bavame ukuqukatha i-hyaluronic acid kanye nezinye izithako ezilungele ukugcoba isikhumba ... Lokhu kugcina isikhumba sami singomanga futhi singangibangeli inkinga ohambweni lwebhanoyi lonke." ― La Carmina
mt0: <pad> "Ngenze into eccentric emangalisa abanye abahambi abangaqiniseki ― ngibeka isithombe sephepha ngasinye njalo ngemuva kwamasonto ambalwa! Ngithengisa izinhlobo eziningi ze-masks ezihlungizayo zase-Asiya, ezinganamile ukuze zingakhathazeki isikhumba sakhe noma ama-noses abantu abadlulayo. Zivame ukuqukethwe kwe-hyaluronic acid nezinye izithako ezihlungizayo... Lokhu kugcina isikhumba sakhe simanzi futhi sikhululekile phakathi nohambo." ― La Carmina</s>

en: The 93-year-old monarch will mark her official birthday this weekend at the most highly anticipated events in the royal calendar - an occasion she has never missed. Her first appearance at the momentous occasion was as a youngster at just 14-months-old for the birthday of her father, George VI. And 90 plus years later, the Queen will this Sunday be surrounded by her growing family on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
zul: Indlovukazi eneminyaka engama-93 izobungaza usuku lokuzalwa ngokusemthethweni ngale mpelasonto emicimbini elindeleke kakhulu ekhalendeni lasendlunkulu - okuwumcimbi angakaze aphuthwe yiwo.  Ukuvela kwakhe kokuqala emcimbini omkhulu okhumbulekayo kwenzeka esayingane enezinyanga eziyi-14 izelwe kuwusuku lokuzalwa kukayise. Futhi emuva kweminyaka engama-90, Indlunkulu ngaleli Sonto uzobe ehlezi nomndeni wakhe okhulayo kuvurande ophezulu esigodlweni i-Buckingham Palace.
mt0: <pad> U-Queen uzoba khona e-Buckingham Palace e-London ngeSonto lapho ahlanganyela khona e-Royal Family - i-royal family - e-birthday yakhe.</s>

en: "Amazing. I'm actually going to be alright," joked Murray, before getting serious. "That was incredible. Thank you so, so much to everyone who came out tonight. Empeleni ngakuthanda ukudlala lapha eminyakeni edlule. Ukuba kwaba wumdlalo wami wokugcina lowo ukusho kwaba yindlela efanele yokuwuqeda, ngikhiphe konke ebenginakho kodwa ngihalalisela uRoberto nethimba lakhe.

en: At age 8, he became part of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh, known as the R.S.S., a right-wing Hindu group that would play a huge role in his life. The R.S.S. is widely seen as a service organization. But its members are the foot soldiers of the Hindu nationalist movement, and some of its critics have accused it of being fascist - in the 1930s the group's members were inspired by Mussolini's Italy.
zul: Eneminyaka eyi-8, uba yingxenye yeRashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh, eyaziwa ngokuthi i-R.S.S., iqembu lontamolukhulu lamaHindu elingadlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu empilweni yakhe. I-R.S.S. ibonakala kakhulu iyinhlangano ehlinzeka ngomsebenzi. Kodwa amalungu ayilabo abahamba ngezinyawo enhlanganweni yobezombusazwe bamaHindu, futhi abanye abangahambisani nayo bayisole ngokuba wontamolukhuni - ngeminyaka yo-1930 amalungu eqembu ayekhuthazwa i-Italy yeMussolini.
mt0: <pad> At age 8, he became part of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh, known as the R.S.S., a right-wing Hindu group that would play a big role in his life. The R.S.S. is widely seen as a service organization. But its members are the foot soldiers of the Hindu nationalist movement, and some of its critics have accused it of being fascist - in the 1930s the group's members were inspired by Mussolini's Italy.</s>

en: Earlier Friday, Trump announced that tariffs on foreign automobiles and parts would be delayed by six months. That gives trade negotiators 180 days to work out a deal with Japan and the EU before resorting to tariffs, which would increase the cost of foreign-made cars and parts in the United States. U.S. trade representative Robert Lighthizer will lead the negotiations and report to Trump, the president said in a proclamation.

Lokho kunika abaxoxisana nabahwebi izinsuku eziyi-180 zokubonisana ngesivumelwano sokuthenga neJaphani kanye ne-EU ngaphambi kokusebenzisa lezo zintela, ezizonyusa amanani ezimoto ezenziwe kwamanye amazwe kanye nezingxenye zazo e-United States. Omele abahwebi e-US uRobert Lighthizer uzohola izingxoxo futhi abikele uTrump, kusho umongemeli esimemezelweni sakhe.
mt0: <pad> UTrump uthe tariffs on cars and parts from Japan and the EU will be delayed by six months.</s>

en: In the quadrangle at school during lunchtime, when my friends were gossiping and giggling about boys, I'd read pages and pages in which my mother described how she had resisted, at the last minute, throwing herself off a cliff or wading into the sea to drown. en: He told BBC Radio 4"s Today programme: "It's not just because of the regulations which Northern Ireland would be subject to with the backstop, but also the fact we would have to treat the rest of the United Kingdom as a third country, we would not participate in any trade deals which the United Kingdom may enter into in the future and we would find that there would be a border down the Irish Sea, which would impede trade with our biggest trading partner, namely GB."
zul: Utshele abasohlweni lwaNamuhla lwe-BBC Radio 4: "Ave nje kumayelana nemithethonqubo iNorthern Ireland ezophoqeleka ukuba ilandele i-backstop, kodwa kuphinde kube wukuba kuzodingeka ukuba i-United Kingdom iyonke njengezwe lesithathu, angeke sizibandakanye ezivumelwaneni sokuhweba i-United Kingdom engase ingene kuzo ngomuso futhi sithola ukuthi kuzoba nomngcele ezansi koLwandle lwama-Irish, okungavimba uhwebo lwethu nozakwethu abakhulu bezohwebo, okuyi-GB."
mt0: <pad> Uthe e-BBC Radio 4's Today programme: "Akukhona nje ngenxa yezimiso ezibanjwa iNingizimu Ireland ngokuthi umthetho wokubuyela emuva, kodwa futhi ngenxa yokuthi sizobaphatha iNingizimu Britain njengomunye umbuso wesithathu, singabahlanganyeli kunoma iyiphi inkontileka yokuhweba eNingizimu Britain ingahlanganyela kuyo esikhathini esizayo futhi singabona ukuthi kube nendawo yokuhweba eMfuleni wase-Irish, okuyinto eyabekela ukuhweba nomlingani wethu omkhulu wokuhweba, i-GB."</s>

en: This kind of two-tier system of medical regulation could also lead techniques such as gene-editing to become much more culturally accepted in some countries than others. en: Around 20 per cent of the time Rubisco mistakenly grabs oxygen instead of CO2, resulting in the production of a toxic substance that must be removed by photorespiration.
